category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Man Running, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Runner, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16  http://emojipedia.org/man-running-type-3/
name: man running: medium-light skin tone

bn:00109992a: (of fluids) moving or issuing in a stream
Moving or issuing in a stream.

bn:00109994a: Of advancing the ball by running

bn:00103421a: (of e.g. a machine) performing or capable of performing

bn:00109995a: Of a horse, having a running gait; not a trotter or pacer.

bn:00093170v: Move fast by using one's feet, with one foot off the ground at any given time
To move quickly by alternately making a short jump off of either foot.
To move forward quickly upon two feet by alternately making a short jump off either foot.

bn:00083395v: To drive fast; to step on the accelerator.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00065828n: Competition where the goal is to complete the course as fast as possible
The sport of competing in races.
The sport of engaging in contests of speed
In sport, racing is a competition of speed, against an objective criterion, usually a clock or to a specific point.

apple_vendor_description: The man running emoji, shown with a medium-light skin tone on Apple devices, captures a dynamic sense of motion and exertion. His pose is athletic, with limbs captured in mid-stride, highlighted by Apple's expert use of glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting that emphasizes musculature.  The smooth gradients and soft rounded edges contribute to its energetic yet approachable appearance, often employed to represent exercise, speed, or a burst of activity in messages.
